chapters.title: Chapter 8: Over the Border
chapters.info: Juilin Sandar, p. 192 (137)—Thief-taker from Tear, one of the best at his craft. He accompanies Nynaeve and Elayne on their travels because Lan asked him to. He accepted partly out of respect for Lan, and partly out of guilt; he betrayed Elayne, Egwene, and Nynaeve to the Black Ajah when Liandrin used Compulsion on him, and later realized how wrong it was.
